judges: Before Steen, C. J., Stbabne, Jones, Mtjsmanno and Aenold, JJ.

opinions.text:
Opinion by
Pee Cueiam,
The decree entered in the Court of Common Pleas of Allegheny County at No. 3136 January Term, 1955, in Equity, is hereby affirmed on the opinion of President Judge McNaugher. Costs on the appellant.
opinions.author: Pee Cueiam,

attorneys: Reuben Fingold, with him A. S. Fingold, for appellant.
. Harry Menzer, with him Sachs, Pervin & Kaufman, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Brown, Appellant, v. Gloeckner.
Argued October 10, 1955.
Before Steen, C. J., Stbabne, Jones, Mtjsmanno and Aenold, JJ.
Reuben Fingold, with him A. S. Fingold, for appellant.
November 30, 1955:
David R. Levin, for appellees.
William L. Jacob, for appellees.
. Harry Menzer, with him Sachs, Pervin & Kaufman, for appellee.
